alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:43PM EDT until June 16 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lee County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... East central Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woods Bay State Park, or 13 miles west of Lake City, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Manning, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Elliott, Turbeville, Mayesville, Lynchburg, Brogdon, Foreston, East Sumter, St. Charles, Gable and Shiloh. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 118 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
